website_summaries.verdict: A good-looking bike by a top manufacturer that's perfect for gliding down the boardwalk, a quiet street, or shady lane.
pros: Attractive curvy styling that's available in several fun color combinations
Choice of several gear options, including an easy-going single-speed model
cons: Handlebars and seat sometimes need tightened
A few bikes arrived with damage

customer_reviews.title: Cute Simple Bike
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a low maintenance bike so went with the single speed and I’m very happy I did. I’ve always had bikes with more gears and was worried about going up hills but it’s no issue at all. I do have to stand sometimes to get more peddling power. This bike is very lightweight, which is necessary for me as I carry it up and down stairs daily. It’s good quality especially for the price. I zip tied a crate onto it to haul groceries and UberEATS deliveries. Overall I’m happy with my choice. And I was able to find a matching helmet 😄
customer_reviews.author: Jenna N

customer_reviews.title: Suits my purpose exactly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike to ride around the neighborhood with my young grandchildren. I haven't had a bum-meister bike since the age of pink-and-white Schwinns. In the intervening years I put in considerable miles on touring bikes. This bicycle arrived excellently packaged, unblemished, and it was mindlessly easy to put together. I don't believe it took me any longer to assemble than it did to strip the wrappings from the parts. Have a tube of white lithium grease at hand for assembly. As I tried out my new bike, I thought about how my biking friends from the past would laugh... Then it dawned on me that they're probably riding these things too. No granny gears; just grannies.
customer_reviews.author: Mary P. Alston

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: It took just shy of 2 months to get, but try to find a bike now is about impossible. She didn't want a bike with gears and hand brakes, so this fit the bill perfect. No problem putting it together in about a hour. I test rode it first to make sure all was good and about nailed the height adjustment the first time for her. She really likes riding around the neighborhood. Now just waiting on mine. Maybe another 2 weeks or so. Both ordered at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE BIKE, but instructions are crappy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike and I absolutely LOVE IT. The package came not damaged at all. BUT the instructions were not clear enough. They clearly use the same instructions for all their bikes which are completely different, and the instructions can become confusing. They should have specified more about the front wheel bolt assembly, they should have included the bike cap into the instructions. And the seatbelt instructions weren’t very clear. It’ll take you around 2 hours to assemble. Also some of the bolts in the picture are different than the ones they give you so that also was a bit confusing.
customer_reviews.author: Oksana Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike for Men AND Women of All Ages!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bikes for both men and women! Lightening FAST shipping. Packaged very professional and securely. Super fun colors. The seats are comfortable, more comfortable than most bikes. Looks well made. Very easy to assemble (20 minutes.) Lots of compliments from neighbors! Much nicer looking than our rusty, Schwinn Hollywoods from 1969! Only ridden twice; so far so good!!! Not sure if the additional lifetime warranty is necessary, I will have to see what all is covered. I think we will order matching fenders. We love the detachable baskets and rechargeable lights we also bought from Amazon! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Neil O.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, smooth ride, and so fun!
customer_reviews.text: I got my husband one (black matte) for our wedding and decided I should have one too his was so cool!! Easy to assemble - about 10 mins and really great quality. I got mint green and love it. We ride almost every day in San Diego!! So fun! Don’t think twice on this company - I have recommended to my friends and family!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy DeMarco

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced cruiser bike
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 cruiser bikes for me and my wife. They were easy enough to assemble - the second one was super easy after figuring out the first. I'd recommend a socket wrench over the included multi-tool if you have one. Both bikes look cool and drive without issue, so I think we got a nice deal based on the price. My one criticism is they don't come with the screw holes to attach a water bottle holder to the frame, but that isn't a big deal. Also, I was able to install 3rd party baskets and child carriers on each bike without issue. I had one quick question I emailed the company, and their response was thorough and fast.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are generic
customer_reviews.text: The bike itself isn't a bad quality bike. while it will never compare to the quality of days gone by American made Schwinn, it will last a while compared to some of the Chinese garbage I have seen at the big box stores. The shipping packaging was well done. Assembly took about an hour, and that is with a mechanical background. Unlike some of the other reviews, I did not find any bent or damaged parts. Once assembled, the bike rode smoothly. Paint quality was fine. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lovetoshop

customer_reviews.title: Quality bike, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this bike after returning a similar style bike we had purchased at a local big box retailer. This sixthreezero bike was much less frustrating to assemble, and the quality was noticeably better. That said, it would have been helpful if the instructions had matched up better to the specific model. Also, be sure to tighten the handlebars really well—they got loose after a ride or two but have been fine ever since we re-tightened them. It still feels a bit strange not to have hand brakes, so evaluate how important that is to you before deciding on your model.
customer_reviews.author: WillServe

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and style
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a comfortable bike to leisurely ride thru the neighborhood in comfort. This bike's tires allow the bumps in the road to feel small. It goes as fast as you can pedal so you can kick it up a knot or ride at a slow relaxing speed. Can't wait to add a bell and the fun basket that I ordered for the front!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Yes. All of the yes.
customer_reviews.text: The color is on point!! It was so easy to put together, for someone that’s never done it it only Took about 30 minutes. I’ve ridden it twice, and it rides nicely. Just make sure you tighten everything enough! I got a basket separately with a bike lock and it was so easy to use. I’m loving it. Thanks for the bike and the great customer service SixThreeZero!
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Lee

customer_reviews.title: Worth the wait
customer_reviews.text: Had to wait 2 months to get this beauty delivered, but, boy was it worth the wait! Feels substantial- heavy weight, great quality. Very comfortable & smooth ride. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Tween

customer_reviews.title: struggled with assembly
customer_reviews.text: After reading good reviews on amazon, I purchased Around the block bike for my wife on our anniversary. However, we both struggled to complete the assembly. The instructions are small as stated by other reviewer. Also its possible that I may have received a faulty seat. I saw few videos on sixthreezero and they directly attach seat post to the seat and tighten the bolts. However, it seems that my seat are missing parts to attach a seat post to it. It was a frustrating experience. I have emailed sixthreezero asking for assistance. If I don't hear back from them in next 24 hours, Ill be returning this bike back to amazon and will look somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Sap 2019

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike
customer_reviews.text: This bike is easy to assemble. The handle bars and seat are also simple to adjust. I am tall, so I appreciated being able to angle the handle bars to accommodate my height. This bike is comfortable and allows me to sit upright, rather than hunched over. It is a great looking, quality product at a great price point.
customer_reviews.author: ME Sags

customer_reviews.title: Great bike, instructions not so much
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice, quality bicycle. It rides very well. However, the instructions are not detailed enough and the illustrations are too small to see anything helpful. I did a lot of guessing, and after some frustration, and redoing things, I finally had it assembled. Please improve the instructions. It is too good of a bike to receive negative reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Nana07

customer_reviews.title: Minty FRESH!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bike because my local bike shop had most of their cool/fun beach cruisers on back order for months...this came in FOUR days (less than originally promised). It was overall easy to put together - had a few screws really difficult to loosen (the one to adjust the handle bars up & down in particular). The front reflector was missing, but no big deal. I have had it for a few days now and absolutely LOVE it. Rides smooth and feels super sturdy. It is very light if you have to pick it up to move it...don't hesitate to get this bike, it's AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: JDNYC333

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Color, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: My fiancée absolutely loves her bike! We bought this open box so there were some dings, scrapes, etc. but that's not on SixThreeZero, it was clearly a bad re-pack job by the 1st purchaser. The mint color is exactly what she wanted and it really does make the bike. I built it myself. The pre-built sections and overall directions were very easy. I recently built my son's Toy Story Huffy and a Cruiser that we ended up returning and these directions were MUCH easier. I'll definitely by one for me when the time comes. Great brand!
customer_reviews.author: Roland

customer_reviews.title: Great basic bike
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a mountain bike and it was too much bike for me and difficult to get off and on. This is a perfect fit! It’s easy to ride and feels like it should hold up well. I had my dad assemble it for me. If the instructions had been more detailed I probably could’ve done it on my own. I’m happy with this bike and enjoy riding it around my neighborhood. After about 30 min the seat gets a little uncomfortable but I think that’s the case with any bike and you just have to get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bike for my easy relaxing rides
customer_reviews.text: This bicycle is gorgeous! Mint is beautiful and gets many compliments riding around. It’s comfortable and perfect for my needs. I mostly just ride with my son around the neighborhood. Now all of my neighbors want one! My nanny and my husband have used it as well and it luckily suits all of us.
customer_reviews.author: NYWhi

customer_reviews.title: This bike is the best of both worlds
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a bike since I was a kid, and I couldn't be more excited about this bike! I did a lot of research to find a beach cruiser that was high quality without the unreasonable price tag. This bike is the best of both worlds! It's beautiful! So well made! The seat is really comfy, the color is beautiful and its an easy smooth ride. Came undamaged, delivered on time, easy to assemble. Excellent customer service! I definitely recommend this bike and company!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah P.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, fun and great support from the company!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new bike.. There was a reflector missing but the company was prompt and helpful. I put it together all by myself. I don’t have much strength in my hands so I had to get help to tighten things up. All the tools were included and the directions were easy to follow.. the bike is fun and easy to ride.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: This Around the Block Woman’s bicycle is perfect to cruise around my small town while social distancing. I was able to easily put the bike together on my own and it was packaged nicely which helped with the process. One of the best aspects is the included rear bike rack it is so convenient to carry extra items. The ride is ideal, the color is cute and it’s just a great deal all around. I love it so much that I store it indoors!
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Sundberg

customer_reviews.title: Great bike, with every part given care and thought.
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with the quality, and sturdiness of the bike. I've assembles a fair number of bikes and this was definitely on the easier side. I am happy with a lot of the thought and care that went into not just the bike, but end user. Had a similar feeling to unboxing an iPhone. Everything was just how it needed to be. The bike itself is really elegant, sleek, and comfortable. It's also a very fun ride.
customer_reviews.author: A Novin

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bicycle for my wife. It arrived as described, very well packaged and it was easy to put together. It’s very lightweight and it’s great quality, especially for the price. The customer service is very helpful and easy accessible by chat or phone. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misaligned front wheel/no response from company
customer_reviews.text: Crooked front wheel/fork. Tried their troubleshooting (holding wheel straight while tightening the bolts), but, despite all efforts, the front wheel will not sit straight. I contacted the company a week ago and still have yet to get a response. The bike is beautiful, and I can't wait to ride it, but, until the company rectifies this, I'm going to have to give it one star.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for slow cruising around the neighborhood
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bike for short distance cruising close to home. It was easy to assemble. Very comfortable to ride. It is perfect for my purposes. The color is really pretty. I haven't had any issues with the bike and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Beachreader

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable bike. I assembled it myself, and though the instructions didn't quite match the model I have, I figured it out. I took it to the grocer's and to the park and I fell in love. I just purchased a carrier for my dog from a different company, now I'm interested in getting Sixthreezero's basket, too, just for the charm and light shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Sylfaen

customer_reviews.title: You need real tools to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: The bike is nice and the ride is smooth, but the assembly is difficult and frustrating, especially with the tools that are included. (You especially need a socket wrench for seat.) The instructions are vague and overly simplified. I spent an hour on the phone with the "mechanic," to no avail. It took me six hours in all, and the help of an auto mechanic and my handyman to finish the job.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Rat

customer_reviews.title: Simple to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This bike came packaged so well!! Very well protected! Took 20 minutes to put together. Rides well. Perfect cruiser which is what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie M.

customer_reviews.title: I really like this bike
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bike! I had done some research (Arthritis Foundation and other sites) as I hadn’t been able to ride in years due to problems with my neck and hands. The handlebars are just right as they help with your posture and alleviate the neck and hand pain that can be associated with riding on a bike that makes you bend forward. Rides smoothly. And the large seat is comfortable. I have been stopped in the street and asked about the bike and I always recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Noreen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time writing a review, and full disclaimer it is to get a free bike bell from the company, but this bike is awesome. My husband bought it for me for my birthday and so far it has been really great- easy to put together, really stable, the color is very cool, and most of all it is soooo much fun to ride. Def recommend this bike to anyone interested in a low key beach cruiser.
customer_reviews.author: Coolrunner1978

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: Loving my new bike so far! The only thing was that the manual did not reflect was that the hardware was already on the bike and not separate in the box as the manual indicates. Wonderful customer service, solid, comfortable ride.
customer_reviews.author: StruggleBugStee

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy bike and I love the color
customer_reviews.text: I was able to assemble it, but the directions are for multiple models so it took a while to figure out why I didn't have the same parts as indicated in the instructions. The only other challenge is that I can't seem to get the bolts tight enough to prevent the seat from swivel and tilting. As a matter of fact, the seat can simply lift off the bar which I'm pretty sure isn't supposed to happen when assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Candy R

customer_reviews.title: Cute bike!
customer_reviews.text: Cute bike and fairly easy to assemble. Seems like good quality. The directions were very unclear on assembling the seat mechanism (the manual made it appear as if the seat came in one piece and had to simply be slipped on the frame, mine was several pieces, bolts etc. that had to be assembled w/ no direction. I haven’t had this long but it’s comfortable and is just what I wanted for biking around with my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Feuerhelm

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bike for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bike for the price. Shopped WALMART for a cruiser. Price there was about $50 less than this bike, but I like the quality of the Sixthreezero much better. A little challenging to assemble - took about 45 minutes, but all in all not bad. My daughter loves the color and the ride - she is happy so I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: it looks good
customer_reviews.text: the bike has back pedal for braking, which I didn't pay attention when ordering. Otherwise, it was good except for coming with the front reflector missing.
customer_reviews.author: ulam

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful, was delivered fast, easy to assemble, and rides nicely. I am 6’ 1” and overweight and the bike holds me well.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Brattoli

customer_reviews.title: bad sprocket out of box
customer_reviews.text: bike received this week. Opened box today. Bike partially assembled. Bike would not peddle. Sprocket not punched out correctly during manufacturing process. This should have been identified in QC and not shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bike well built
customer_reviews.text: Giving 4 stars. The bike is nice looking, rides very smooth and easy assembly. That being said I am returning. The handle bars are so far apart it’s awkward to ride and the breaks aren’t for quick stops at all!
customer_reviews.author: MommyOf2

customer_reviews.title: Please do NOT buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worst bike ever!! Should of know the minute I tired to assemble it. Bar came upside down and took hours to put back the correct direction. Rode the bike one time and everything is falling apart... will insert picture so you can see for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: beautiful bike for the price
customer_reviews.text: beautiful bike for the price. My wife really enjoys riding it. Build quality is excellent and it came about 80% assembled. Took my around 15 minutes to completely assemble the bike. The coaster brakes takes some time for you to get used to. Once you get used to it, it probably stops better than ordinary brakes.
customer_reviews.author: Erwin Isidoro

customer_reviews.title: Love this bike!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bike-love riding it already! However, a couple of manufacturing issues when assembling. The front u-frame that goes over the front tire was 1 1/2" too narrow to fit over the front axle. My husband was able to mount it in a bench vice and stretch it apart. Also, be aware that the directions may not be exactly for the varied bike you recieved. They were slightly different than my model but easy enough to understand. Overall, well designed and quality bike!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and fun to ride!
customer_reviews.text: During the stay at home order, my 12-year-old daughter was looking for anything to keep her busy. So, I ordered this beach cruiser and hoped for the best! I was pleasantly surprised that it was simple enough to assemble that I didn't have to wait for my husband to be off of work to get it put together. Once I assembled it, she was off and riding! I've given it a try and it's great! Very pleased with my purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: This bike was super easy to put together and makes for a fun ride! The handlebars arent the most comfortble but that could be partly because I am just not used to it. I had not ridden a bike in 15 years prior to buying this one. Its a great, easy to assemble, easy to ride bike for casual riders.
customer_reviews.author: S. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfortable and cool!
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this bike for me as a quarantine Mother’s Day gift. I wanted something comfortable and fun to keep up with my 5 and 7 year old. It was definitely worth the wait! It has a beautiful design and is a great ride. I love it! I’m so glad I waited for it and didn’t go with a different option.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bike from a wonderful company!!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the excellent workmanship of the bike, the ease of setup, and the simple, but pleasing lines of the bike. Love the mint green paint on the frame. The accompanying literature is very attractive and VERY user friendly. For the price and the no fuss warranty, there is no other option. Go sixthreezero!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin A. Chase

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic beach cruiser!!
customer_reviews.text: Love! I haven't had a bike for 20 years! Husband and I purchased bikes off of Amazon and I ready the great reviews of this bike. Super easy to assemble, exactly as pictured and cannot wait to take it for a spin!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: Love the bicycle. Very comfortable larger seat. It’s a great riding for pleasure bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: haven’t been on a bicycle for almost 25 years and I’m in LOVE my new bike
customer_reviews.text: I’m 47, haven’t been on a bicycle for almost 25 years and I’m in LOVE my new bike!!! Fast shipping, great packaging and easy assembly. Took a spin around the neighborhood this morning and had a blast! Great value for the money, ordered one for my bf as well, his will be here soon, really looking forward to cruising around together!
customer_reviews.author: valleykat

customer_reviews.title: Great neighborhood bike
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike for my wife to use as an everyday bike to ride around the neighborhood. She loves it. It is a great bike for the price you can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely thrilled with my new bike. The bike is beautiful and simple/easy to ride - exactly what I wanted. It took me about 20 minutes to put together and I spent another 10 minutes after my first ride adjusting the seat/handlebars/etc. to get the perfect fit. I use it for rides at the beach on flat streets/sidewalks. It is great for leisurely rides (I normally ride for about 10 miles) and is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amy O Stroud

customer_reviews.title: Perfect- Better than i expected
customer_reviews.text: I actually got it 2 weeks earlier than expected and am thrilled with this purchase!! My husband put it together without any issues at all. It is perfect- exact color that i ordered, it's very solid and sturdy. We are ordering another one for him. With Florida's 'winter' coming, we will have many months to enjoy the new bikes!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Parts missing but easy assembly and great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The bike came from backorder with a few minor parts missing (nothing that stopped from assembly) but a quick email had this straightened out and the parts were sent within days. Assembly was really easy and is a very comfortable ride.
customer_reviews.author: D. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great cruiser
customer_reviews.text: This bike is great! It’s cimfortable and relatively easy to assemble. This is our second bike and we love it. The color is so cute and the quality of the bike is next level. - Jessica
customer_reviews.author: Josh and Jessica Jones

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: This bike has peddles missing, and multiple other items. Very disappointed. Hoping the seller will ship the rest of the items so I can assemble the bike.....
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike!
customer_reviews.text: The mint green color is slightly darker in person than on the screen but other than that I love my new bike! It’s comfortable, rides smoothly, and even as a single speed it isn’t terrible difficult on slight hills. It’s wonderful exercise and I am looking forward to riding it this spring and summer through my neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete items and bad pedals
customer_reviews.text: Package came without the Brake Assembly. I had to order a brake Assembly from Amazon costing extra Also the left pedal could not fit in.
customer_reviews.author: Udeme

customer_reviews.title: Smooth ride
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bike. Rides smoothly and most important, comfortably. Easy to assemble. An eye turner.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Freas

customer_reviews.title: Great bike,
customer_reviews.text: The bike was easy to assemble with very clear instructions and the necessary tools are included. The bike was well packaged so it arrived undamaged with no scratches. The bike is super comfortable. Being older I am loving the simplicity of the beach cruiser. This well made bike is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Norm

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable ride
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to ride. Easily adjustable seat and handlebars. Takes some getting used to coming from a 7 speed but I think I’ll stick with single speeds from now on. Love it and would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Annabella Trotta

customer_reviews.title: Came with a flat/bad tire.
customer_reviews.text: Bike looks nice but it came with a completely flat tire that we had to have replaced. When reading other reviews about this issue I thought it was a fluke or if not it would just need to be inflated. Nope, needed to have it replaced. Also found another bike that looks exactly like this one for half the cost at Wal-Mart.
customer_reviews.author: kindlec1

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable  cruiser  and easy to assemble right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Surprised! Love these bikes! I bought two, one for my wife and and one for me. Easy to assemble and the instructions are straight forward. The multi tool that comes with each bike is a bit hard to get bolts tight, but overall very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bicycle back in March, I just received it last week and couldn’t wait to put it together. I had a little difficultly with some parts but pretty simple. Directions aren’t particularly clear and a little confusing, But let me tell you it was well worth the wait! This bike is for total pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Parola

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Bike is already broken. Handle bars bent and can’t tighten, seat broken won’t tighten. Terrible bike.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great Cruiser - Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bike to cruise around the neighborhood with my kiddos. Was very easy to assemble took my husband less than 15 minutes. Mint Green color is super cute and true to picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amaya

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and high quality cruiser bike
customer_reviews.text: The bike arrived in a timely manner and was well packed with no damage. The assembly was fairly straight forward and took less than an hour from unpacking to completion. If we assembled a second bike it would take between 20 and 30 minutes with the learning curve. My wife loves the comfort and smoothness of the bike. We would recommend this attractive and high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Kage

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but a few dings.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking bike and seems to be high quality. The reason I gave it 4 is even with the good packaging, there's a scratch in the frame that looked to happen at the factory because it was under the protective sleeves. Also there's 3 or 4 specks of a different color in the front forks. Overall good enough, it's a present so we'll see if the color defects are enough to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: TJLM

customer_reviews.title: Cruisin' with my new wheels!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Sixthreezero bike! It was very easy to assemble and it is very sleek. Good quality product. Perfect for cruising around the neighborhood. Seat is comfortable. I didn't think it would get delivered for a while since it was out of stock when I ordered it, but got it within a few weeks. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bike!
customer_reviews.text: My bike came in today! I got busy right away with the assembly. Not a problem putting together if you follow the instructions and take your time. The mint green is beautiful, especially with the black. Can't wait to get rolling on my cruiser!😁
customer_reviews.author: Tracy H.

customer_reviews.title: Solid bike
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to assemble but some parts needed to be greased. Despite a lot of protective packaging, one of the handle grips was a little messed up. Still functional.
customer_reviews.author: KK Parks

customer_reviews.title: Quality USA built bike - happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Received my bike with lightening fast Prime delivery (less than 48 hours) and was immediately impressed upon taking it out of the box. Everything reqired was included, easy assembly instructions, top quality product, also pleased with the price. My husband had it ready for me to ride in under 30 minutes. Love the mint green color and matching basket. This will look sharp on the paths and trails along 30A 😎 FL
customer_reviews.author: MicheleHK

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike! I wish the seat was just a little more cushioned but it’s still comfortable. I’m so glad I chose this brand! Easy to assemble and adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: So happy to get my beach cruiser! It's a smooth ride and was pretty easy to assemble, even for someone not mechanically inclined, and it was great to have the tools included. I would recommend the Around The Block to anyone who just wants to cruise, not be anywhere in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: Diane G.

customer_reviews.title: Love this bike!!
customer_reviews.text: This bike is sooo cute! I’ve been wanting to get back into riding to help give my knees a break from running and training. I also didn’t want something boring and ugly. This bike is perfect for a few miles around the neighborhood toting our daughter around. Word to wise though, if you’re a little stacked in the bottom you may want a wider seat later on for longer rides. Bike arrived pretty much assembled with easy instructions to finish the rest!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Bike!!
customer_reviews.text: We got this bike for my daughter for Christmas and she absolutely loves it! it was pretty easy to put together and seems incredibly strong. She looks so cute cruising around our street with it!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Haynes

customer_reviews.title: First grown up bike
customer_reviews.text: This bike was easy to put together for this single mom. My daughter (10) loves it and loves the ease of pedaling and comfort of the seat. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: N. Mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Smooth ride.
customer_reviews.text: It was so easy to put together. I was disappointed that I couldn't step through the bike. I still have to swing my leg on and off to exit the bike.
customer_reviews.author: kindle

customer_reviews.title: The bike was just what I expected. I was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: All the tools are included to assemble. That was an extra. Very important extra.
customer_reviews.author: Jewell Rushing

customer_reviews.title: great cruiser
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my wife...she absolutely loves it. Easy to assemble and add accessories to. She takes it to yardsales in the neighborhood and is constantly asked if it is for sale.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Summers

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly and Sharp Looking Bike!
customer_reviews.text: My purchase was a gift for my girlfriends daughter and she loved it! I assembled bike in roughly 30 to 45 minutes. I did take 5 two minute breaks cause my back kept cramping but other then that relatively easy. Instructions where easy to follow but pictures should be larger or zoomed in to see details. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looking cool (not bad for 60+)
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my wife who is thrilled with it. After some fitting adjustments she was off round the neighborhood, looking cool (not bad for 60+)! She was not comfortable on my spare mountain bike and as there are no mountains or even hills on the NC coast this is not a problem. The packaging was sound and I assembled the bike under an hour. There were no tools with it, although the manual seemed to suggest there should be. I had Sockets and Allen keys so again no problem. The true test will be if she goes out on the bike without me, but only time will tell........
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bike with special brake.
customer_reviews.text: I must admit that the bike is really very beautiful as exactly the picture looks. And all the assembly materials are attached within the package (except that you do need an extra screwdriver). It's hard to do the assembly and the instruction helped little. Can't wait to ride it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice but it's not all that. I thought I was getting a better bike by not going to Walmart and getting a cheapie but it would have made no difference. The brakes don't work very well on the one speed model that I got. We added a basket to the front.
customer_reviews.author: David Dorfman

customer_reviews.title: Beach Cruiser
customer_reviews.text: So excited to have this bike to ride along the oceanfront paths. Working to get into shape for a bike tour through the wine country and this will be the perfect bike for preparation. Easy and comfortable excited to do more local exploring on this bike and it looks nice too!
customer_reviews.author: cindycooper

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy to put together and fun to ride!!
customer_reviews.author: Brinn Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bike for a mellow beach ride
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this bike! Super easy to setup and we've already used it several times. Perfect for riding on the boardwalk at the beach near our apartment. Even now, in the winter, it makes every day better. The value is unbeatable. A sturdy bike with amazing support. And stylish to boot!
customer_reviews.author: The Mazloys

customer_reviews.title: This bike is fantastic! The instructions were very easy to read which ...
customer_reviews.text: This bike is fantastic! The instructions were very easy to read which made assembly quick and accurate. The seat is very comfortable and makes the ride that much more enjoyable. The only problem is that the actual color of the bike looks a little darker then the one shown in the picture, but regardless it is still a beautiful color! Very happy wth this purchase, I would highly recommend this bike to anyone who wants a cruiser bike!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Bensey

customer_reviews.title: Like a kid again!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and amazing value for the price. Bike arrived nicely packaged and frame color is perfect! Only issue was no multitool or allen wrenches in box, but made it work with my own tools. First bike in 40 years- looking forward to many rides!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Botelho

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing bike
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my bike. I like staring at it and i like riding it. I got the around the block one and its so beyond comfortable. Not to mention, It has lifetime warranty. Definitely cant beat that. Also This is the perfect bike to ride with your dog as well. Mine loves it !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: One of the pedals would not screw into the bike due to poor machining. The bike is useless now. Amazon requested that I send it back but I can’t get it to fit back in the box. Not worth the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike, well made and great value
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before buying a bike for my wife, and came across this. What can I say, she loves it and has not stopped riding it for the last few weeks. She loves the color, the size (she's 5' 2") and the simplicity of it. For my part, it was easy to put together (it took about 40 minutes) and came with tools and easy instructions. I would absolutely recommend this bike to anyone. we love it
customer_reviews.author: Andrew j.

customer_reviews.title: Great bike, wish I’d gotten multi-speed/hand-brake
customer_reviews.text: Love this bike!!! It’s so comfortable and easy to ride - and SO pretty!! I do wish I had gotten one with gears and a hand-brake though. Other than that, it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: This bike came with easy to assemble directions, tools, and it was nicely packaged. It is a great bike for cruising around and fun for everyone. My entire family took it for a ride including a grown man and everyone raved about its comfort and speed. Will definitely buy another one when in the market for another cruiser.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay A Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I’m not Mrs Gulch from the Wizard Of Oz
customer_reviews.text: Two wheels. Two feet. Flat roads. I got it going on.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Love this bike!
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful bike! Beautiful color, prompt customer service. My husband is an avid cyclist biking 20+ miles daily to work. He said it's a really nice bike, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Love this bike!
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a cruiser for a long time and after tons of research I decided on this one. The bike is excellent quality, it's easy to put together (I did it myself in under an hour including unboxing) and if you find it challenging six three zero offers access to their own bike mechanics through Skype/Facebook/etc. to assist you in putting it together. I've already taken it on a few rides and absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike - STEAL for the price
customer_reviews.text: Assembling this bike wasn’t too bad. It’s easy to follow the directions. The bike is packaged very well and it is protected against any scratches. This bike is super good for the value especially for the price. I would recommend this bike to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Mcpherson

customer_reviews.title: Can't Wait to Cruise!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my new "Around the Block" women's bike and I'm super excited! Assembly of this bicycle was super easy and I was able to complete it in less than an hour. It was very helpful that all the tools I needed to put it together was included in box. Solid frame and well constructed. Bike looks amazing and I'm ready to goooo!
customer_reviews.author: Centinella

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for Xmas
customer_reviews.text: Was fairly easy to assemble. Had a bit of an issue with the tire when it came in, but we let them know and they replaced it super fast. We were back on the road in no time. Wife really loved the mint green color.
customer_reviews.author: Alex C.

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: It is so fun to ride around my neighborhood. I am elderly and this bike is great exercise for me.
customer_reviews.author: HercNDolly

product_meta.title: sixthreezero Around The Block Women's Single-Speed Beach Cruiser Bicycle
feature_bullets: Classic, curvy women's beach cruiser bicycle with 17-inch durable steel frame; ideal for casual, comfortable riding around the neighborhood
Upright riding style keeps your back and shoulders comfortable; dual-spring saddle and wide cruiser handlebar with foam grips
Single-speed bike great for cruising on flat terrain; pedal-backwards coaster brakes for easy stopping
26-inch, 2.125-inch wide aluminum wheels with large waffle tread tires provide a cushioned ride for easy rolling
Blacked-out components for added style; includes rear rack for optional baskets and panniers; Drop Out: 3/8" Threading Axle

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
